Description: Pale green glazed composition amuletic figure of a boar-headed man wearing a lappet-wig and kilt; transversely pierced back-pillar.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.47

Published: C. Andrews, 'The Boar, the Ram-Headed Crocodile and the Lunar Fly' in W. V. Davies (ed), Studies in Egyptian Antiquities: A Tribute to T. G. H. James (BM Occasional Paper 123, 1999), 79-81.
